root.name: Hero's Quest: So You Want To Be A Hero?
root.description:
As a graduate of the Famous Adventurer's Correspondence School, you have journeyed to Spielburg valley to seek your fame. And boy is there fame to be had. An ogress has cursed the baron. Brigands and monsters lurk in the forest.
The fame and fortune is there for the taking, you've just got to stay alive and figure out how to get it.
